description:
Streamline the process of syncing, backing up, finding and sharing contacts anywhere you go with Plaxo’s easy-to-use app. It combines your multiple address books with your iPhone/iPad contacts & delivers your entire contact network right to your iOS device. Quickly backup & recover your contacts/address book if you lose your phone or your computer crashes.
 
*****USER REVIEWS*****
“Don't know what I would do without this app. It's a must on your iPhone. Saved me several times."  – Sultan Joe, 3/5/12

“Good working app for contacts sync and backup.” – Mari Smir, 2/29/2012

“I have used this app for years and it gives me access to all the business and friends I have. It is wonderful and never leave home without it!” – Ruleshissun, 2/29/2012

“I have been using this for years and it's the best way to sync contacts on multiple devices! – Tmart9, 2/22/2012
 
FREE FEATURES & BENEFITS:
• Effortless 2-way syncing between your Plaxo address book and your iOS device (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch)
• Securely backup all of your contacts to Plaxo for faster data recovery and transfer to additional Apple iOS devices or other address books
• Quickly share your contact info via email anywhere you are, so it’s even easier to share your contact card on the go
• Easily communicate with multiple contacts by using SMS
• Take your address book with Plaxo on the go, wherever you are
• NOTE: Plaxo app replaces Microsoft Exchange contacts sync and is compatible with Exchange email and calendar
 
FREE WEB FEATURES:
• Get all your contacts together in one place with instant imports from Outlook, Mac, Gmail, Yahoo, Hotmail, LinkedIn, and more
• Backup and recover your contacts securely in the cloud--you’ll have peace of mind knowing that your contact list is backed up and easily recoverable, even if you lose your phone.
• Cut the clutter by safely merging duplicates into a single, consolidated address book using De-Duper
• Choose how to share your info with contacts and receive automatic updates when other Plaxo members change their contact info
• Receive birthday alerts for your contacts, effortlessly send them eCards and make everyone happy
releaseNotes:
•Compatibility with IOS 7.x
•Fixed crash while opening app
•Fixed crash while syncing
